screen.title: Input
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 120, textsize[1] + 120) count = len(self.list) if count > 12: count = 12 offset = 45 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 30
if (975 > wsizex): wsizex = 975 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 45 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(15, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-wsizex)/2, (1080-wsizey)/2))

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 120, textsize[1] + 120) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 90 wsizex = textsize[0] + 180 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (900 > wsizex): wsizex = 900 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 90) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(15, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, (1080-wsizey)/2))
